taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus idaeobatus;section idaeanthi;species triphyllus;

treatment.description: with procumbent canes pilose when young, pinnate ternate leaves, long-stalked rhombic-rotund terminal leaflet and purple incumbent petals,
treatment.habitat_elevation_distribution_or_ecolog: has appeared in vacant lots, Boston, Mass.
